titleStmt.title: Stafford-shires misery, set forth in a true relation of the barbarous cruelty of the forces raised against the Parliament. Sent in a letter from Stafford, by Captaine William Robinson, to a gentleman in London, and to be presented to Mr. Speaker. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, William, Captain.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through on all pages, with considerable loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
